short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Provided key/value pairs of charge codes and labels, re-labels timesheets for ease of use.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Tired of generic project names?
Badly labeled charge codes?
With this handy tool, provide a mapping of charge codes to sensible labels, and watch as it magically re-labels your timesheet in front of your very eyes.

Disclaimer: Will this always work? Probably not.
